content: little baby filet crochet set skill level intermediate size blanket approx 17 5 x 18 5 hat approx 12 circumference materials for blanket & hat 300 yds soft worsted wt yarn in color of choice mc for trim 50 yds soft worsted wt yarn in color of choice cc sample shown in caron simply soft light green & cream size h/8 5 mm hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle gauge 15 sts & 7 5 row = 4 in double_crochet on size h hook pattern notes blanket is worked back & forth in row following chart hat is worked in rounds from crown to lower edge 1 terms/abbreviations beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet each ea hook hk increase increase repeat repeat round round single_crochet single_crochet skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch space space stitch st blanket row 1 with mc chain 66 double_crochet in 4th chain from hk double_crochet in ea chain across turn 64 double_crochet row 2 chain 3 double_crochet in ea double_crochet across turn 64 double_crochet begin chart row 3 chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet *chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet open block completed double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet 4 solid blocks completed chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet ** double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat from * once then repeat from * to ** once ending with double_crochet in last 2 sts turn continue to follow chart row 4-31 at end of row 31 do not cut yarn begin edging chain 1 single_crochet evenly along left side of blanket working 2 single_crochet in ea row 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet in ea st along beginning foundation row 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet evenly along right side of blanket being sure to have same number of sts as along left side 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet in ea double_crochet across top 3 single_crochet in corner join with slip_stitch fasten_off mc add trim join cc in center single_crochet of edging on foundation chain edge of blanket *chain 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet skip next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * all around blanket working across 3 sts of ea corner as follows chain 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet twice join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in tails hat round 1 with mc chain 4 join into ring or use disappearing loop method wind yarn around forefinger once insert hook into loop yo pull loop through ring chain 3 work 11 double_crochet over strands of ring join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 pull yarn tail to close ring 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in same st at base of beg chain work 2 double_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 do not turn 24 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in same st at base of beg chain double_crochet in next double_crochet *2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from *
